text: Enkal iraivane! Niccayamaka nan en cantatiyariliruntum, cankaiyana un vittin (kahpavin) aruke, vivacayamillata (ip)pallattakkil, enkal iraivane! - Tolukaiyai avarkal nilai niruttattuvatarkakak kutiyerriyirukkinren; enave makkalil oru tokaiyinarin itayankalai avarkalpal cayntitac ceyvayaka! Innum avarkal nanri celuttum poruttu kanivarkkankaliliruntu avarkalukku ni akaramum alippayaka
